title: Building a house in a cemetery | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: her second question is what's the ruling on building a house in a cemetery this is not permissible the profit erase or some prohibited walking over graves he prohibited sitting over graves so the graveyard is a public place and you are not allowed to build a house in a public place without permission and you're not allowed to build a house over a graveyard to begin with and Allah knows best
